articles.author: Travis Loller
articles.title: U.S. says it will deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia to Eswatini because he fears deportation to Uganda - AP News
articles.description: Attorneys for Immigration and Customs Enforcement say they intend to send Kilmar Abrego Garcia to the African nation of Eswatini after he expressed a fear of deportation to Uganda. The Salvadoran man lived in Maryland for more than a decade before he was mist…
articles.content: Attorneys for Immigration and Customs Enforcement said in a Friday letter that they intend to send Kilmar Abrego Garcia to the African nation of Eswatini after he expressed a fear of deportation to U… [+2390 chars]
